Plot: Mustafali is a man liberated from all ambitions, living in Çökertme Cove, keeping to his own life style. But due to the sickness of his father, who had left him and his mother years ago, he had to come to Istanbul.
Title: Mandira Filozofu Istanbul
Actors: Ugur Alibasoglu, Mehmet Auf, Zinaida Chistol, Gulnihal Demir
